Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Creates a recovery living task force
Summary: Creates a recovery living task force to establish best practice guidelines for recovery living residences that illustrate the most appropriate and effective environment for persons recovering from a chemical dependency.
LawCode: Add ยง19.04, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the creation of a recovery living task force
